data.text: @myrabatchelder @DrKYSR @CDCgov I have a deep feeling they just want more to croak... and the injection does not protect against the new variants. Read it somewhere .. just tired of all the bull and bad news
@myrabatchelder @CDCgov The vaccinated are also dying from COVID. A smaller percentage right now so they say, These are American lives.

Look at chart from January 2022 below, around 2,103 people die daily from heart disease.

2,908 people died from #Covid19 in US yesterday. 

https://t.co/zOWzF6XAFK https://t.co/jhm5TF0kIn

@myrabatchelder @CDCgov 1. 2,908 deaths were reported yesterday, from people who died over the past few days/weeks.
2. As deaths occur 21-30 days after testing positive, this reflects case counts 3-4 weeks ago.
3. In the past 3-4 weeks, cases have fallen by 75%.
4. Deaths will fall below 1K/day soon.
